name: My forgotten shadow
description:
Possible trigger warnings : weapon on a CG, stalking theme, lights jumpscares (shadows), mentions of depression (and death in an ending ). Please be aware of these warnings before to play this game ! The opinions and behaviors expressed by the characters are not endorsed by the developer.

____________________________________________

a short visual-novel inspired of psychological tropes

You met a cute cosplayer at an anime convention :)

You are a digital artist who was invited to the super anime golden week convention. There, nobody recognized you until you met a fan who loved your first comic named "Henrietta". You are demoralized but this meeting made you feel good.  But things seem to get weird.

(short summary but otherwise I'll spoil everything lmao)

Game Features: 

- 4 ENDINGS

- 5 CGs  

- Gender-neutral MC

- QTE (easy ngl)

This game was meant to be short (around 15 minutes) and entertaining for those who want a scary story. I personally recommend getting all the endings to understand the whole plot.

____________________________________________

I did it for the sweet and sour game jam but the more I look at it, the more it seems off topic lol. I'm glad I participated though <3 !

____________________________________________

However, english is not my first language. If some parts of the story are dull, It was not my intention.

I used dova syndrome songs and backgrounds / sounds with no royalties.
